TopicTitle: I finally made a forum account

Articles.Content:
Hi, my name is bueskyd.

I have been playing KSP almost nonstop, since i bought it over a year ago, but i only just now made a forum account.

I mostly build SSTO's but i also enjoy making rockets.

Also I'm not a native English speaker, sooooo yeeeaaaah.

Hello bueskyd, and welcome to the forums!

We have a very international community here, including an international section which has several subforums for languages other than English.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forums! Your english seems to be better than most native English speakers on YouTube, so kudos for that. If you feel like talking to fellow whatever-your-country-isians, there are some subforums at the bottom of the main page.
